name: ArmGun
description:
Upgrade your ArmGun with funds. Eliminate intruders to acquire funds.

Made in more or less 48 hours for 2018's http://mcgamejam.com (https://itch.io/jam/mcgame-jam-2018).

The theme was "This isn't even my final form".

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow keys - Move
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left mouse button - Shoot
  • Space, tab, and F keys - Open/close upgrade menu
Source code

https://github.com/Ohmnivore/ArmGun
